Name: Family Business
About the game: Family Business puts the player in a comic world that portrays the golden age of the Mafia, being entirely Indie and made by just one person! Play with friends or with BOTS , make allies or enemies , it's up to you... There are a variety of Gamemodes to have fun like Conquest , Team Kill , Etc. Its unique and comical gameplay makes the player experience much better, especially with customizable and fast matches! Speaking of customization, how about customizing your own arsenal and testing it out ! Play Single Player or Multiplayer games, it doesn't matter how, but do your best and kill as many as possible to receive a cash bonus at the end of the game and thus buy more weapons in the store and increasingly become the most feared Mafioso of all Family Business Server. It's nothing personal, it's just business, family business... Good luck! If you liked the idea of ​​the project and want to be part of this story, you can contact our E-mail and make donations to support the project! contato.familybusiness@gmail.com
